original_title: ポニョはこうして生まれた 〜 宮﨑駿の思考過程 〜
overview: A behind-the-scenes documentary directed by Kaku Arakawa, documenting Hayao Miyazaki's creative process in creating the character of Ponyo during the production of Ponyo on the Cliff by the Sea.
title: How Ponyo was Born ~Hayao Miyazaki's Thought Process~
